biotools.summary:
Blind spectral unmixing of highly mixed multispectral flow and image cytometry data.

Matlab code to spectrally unmix highly mixed multispectral flow and image cytometry data.

To use NMF-RI on new data (tissue or flow cytometry) we recommend to use the ´main.m´ code distributed and load new cytometry data to the existing folder hierarchy.

bioschemas.name: NMF-RI
